name: Roos (Rondaar)
description:
A little turn based game made for Ludum Dare 42, Theme: Running out of space.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/roos-2

You play as a blue creature, trying to find a purpose in life, by achiving the highest score! Fight the evil beings which copy your moves! Make sure to send a screenshot of your yours in the comments section!

PS. If you'll ever get stuck, 'R' is always there for you <3
